import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent implements OnInit{ loading: boolean = true; ngOnInit() { // Simulating data loading delay setTimeout(() => { this.loading = false; }, 3000); } }

Welcome to Library Management System

"Nothing is Pleasanter than exploring a Library"



Services

What kind of Books we have??

"The Great Gatsby" by F. Scott Fitzgerald"

Set in the 1920s, this classic novel explores themes of wealth, love, and the American Dream through the captivating story of Jay Gatsby.

"To Kill a Mockingbird" by Harper Lee:

This Pulitzer Prize-winning novel delves into racial injustice and morality as seen through the eyes of young Scout Finch in the fictional town of Maycomb, Alabama.

"Pride and Prejudice" by Jane Austen

A beloved romance novel, it follows the spirited Elizabeth Bennet as she navigates societal expectations, family dynamics, and her complex relationship with the enigmatic Mr. Darcy.

Magni Dolores

Excepteur sint occaecat cupidatat non proident, sunt in culpa qui officia deserunt mollit anim id est laborum

"1984" by George Orwell

A dystopian masterpiece, this novel depicts a totalitarian society ruled by Big Brother, where individualism and freedom of thought are oppressed.

"Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone" by J.K. Rowling

The first book in the iconic Harry Potter series introduces readers to the magical world of Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, following Harry's journey as a young wizard.
